channel.title: Its a sad sad day for pkers
channel.description:
afk pkn on one and shithouse on the other.
ive been gone from runescape for a bit lately...ps3 gaming n shit...so maybe ive missed the release of a pking server??????
if not any of you cunts that can actually code/maintain a server give me a yell....ima pay for one to be released this is guddam bullshiet son.
p.s...totally serious here, thinking something like a lump sum for my half baked idea to be polished then a weekly or monthly rate for you to keep it maintained, stability/updates etc.
I JUST WANT TO FOOKEN PK AMG

item.title: Its a sad sad day for pkers
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

I am now paying for ‘your’ pking server to be released. Post ur entry here. Winner gets thier server hosted for the first month on a premo Staminus package…

I am serious, therefore i will be checking this thread regularily for a couple months, regardless of its activity or position in these forums. If anyone is thinking bout hosting a well thought out pking server but is lacking the funds to do so, speak up before i loose faith entirely.

Entries that will be taken most seriously are the kind you’d expect to see in the RSC advertisement section.

Entries in the form of a “mission statement” will also be accepted, granted screenshots of the work-in-progess is given at a later date.

Anyone who wishes for thier potential pking server to not be viewed by the public, can pm me with a link leading to thier entry.

Read full topic
item.source: Its a sad sad day for pkers

item.title: Its a sad sad day for pkers
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Andrew Ix Andrew
item.description:
@Ix_Andrew wrote:

I included the bot issue because you are always posting flaws on other server advertisements, so i might aswell throw out some of your flaws. You can say that you NEVER spawned items, i say you did and i believe in my statement, not going to play that game… But you speak as in your some type of angel that has never got there hands dirty with the attack on other servers. I just find it funny that you try to make yourself out to be such a grand administrator, but you still abuse yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Its a sad sad day for pkers

item.title: Its a sad sad day for pkers
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Andrew Ix Andrew
item.description:
@Ix_Andrew wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:4, topic:391442”]I do RSCE because I somewhat enjoy it and care about the project, if someone was paying me to do it I would have done the bare requirement and not gone the extra mile. If you want something done to a high standard you can’t just pay someone a small amount and expect anything decent as they will want to just finish it as quickly as they can putting in the least amount of effort required. Even if you get it to a state where you’re happy with it you need someone with a decent knowledge of programming to maintain it if a problem arose or you simply wanted it updating.

Now that’s speaking purely about code but realistically there’s a lot more to worry about, mainly the server management and web side of things. You make the best RSC source ever but if your actual server/website is vulnerable your coding ability is gunna be redundant anyway.

Kids in this community will do and try anything to take you down/make your life running a server hard as most people find out when they open a new RSC server. It’s really not a case of just paying someone to code a bit for you unfortunately.[/quote]

Are you included in one of these ‘kids’ ? Because it seems to me that you are. You bring up the point that stork has 20 players online… Well 1/2+ of your server’s population has/had access to a bot, but nothing has been done about it. You bash a server about online count but your ways of running/maintaining a server resembles a reh-tard. OldskoolRSC, if you want to play a server with an abusive admin, millions of spawned gp/items, and a community with access to public bots whenever they choose to, HAVE A GREAT STAY AT RSCE.

Read full topic
item.source: Its a sad sad day for pkers

item.title: Its a sad sad day for pkers
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

ur saying it would work better if they had a background in runescape, or atleast experience with how these servers operate? if so, thats why i was willing to pay quite a bit for someone in this scene to do it for me, but that aint happening so my best bet remains what i said above.

The offer still stands for anyone here, i am totally serious about this and i wont be paying chicken feed…

Read full topic

im thinking bout rockn up to my local uni, find some coders, offer a grand and say MAKE IT NERD. good plan?

seriously tho…if someone was learning C++ or wateva programmers learn from skool these days…how hard would it be to look at these runescape sources and get to work???
